title: Quick question about Frozen and Yellow Jacket Shen
body:
So Frozen Shen = Sub-Zero and Yellow Jacket Shen = Scorpion right?

My question is wouldn't it have made more sense to give Shen the Sub-Zero inspired skin and give Zed the Scorpion one? I feel like it's a waste giving Shen both of them

replies.body:
Unless I have my dates super wrong, the Yellow Jacket skin came out long before Zed was released.

However, I don't think a Scorpion-esque skin for Zed would be a good fit, maybe Smoke instead. Eh? Eh!? ...I'll see myself out.
Urgot is more in-line with Scorpion: _"GET OVER HERE!"_

Why do you think so? An hell related theme for Zed would fit very well IMO.

Though I think It would look like Shockblade Zed chroma with fire particles. Still worth.
LegendLarry is correct. Both of those Shen skins are much older than Zed is.
